relation: add Administrator mode button. See Bug 151669
Pushing in KPackageKit (dependant on PolicyKit integration)
Make Eigen 2 ready for KDE, and move it to kdesupport
Port all Eigen-using code in KDE and KOffice to Eigen 2.0
Create OSD based replacement for current KPassivePopup [Deferred to 4.3]
Create a context framework with working activities
Various Akonadi related items can be found here http://techbase.kde.org/Projects/PIM/Akonadi#Scheduled_for_4.2
KDEPrint is dead, long live system-config-printer-kde (kdeadmin) and printer-applet (kdeutils)! Thanks to jriddell for these.
